title: Bloodlord Vladimir
body: Still waiting on an update for this skin since it really needs one...{{champion:8}}

replies.body:
At least it has a voice over...

Thats more than most old Legendaries get...

:(

Hey It's you again! Again... wow. You're really everywhere :D

Oh and about the actual post (xD) he really does need a update.

Yea haha xD
I just like the game that much :P
I strive to take an interest in many of its factors xD haha

And yes, as a vlad player i know it does haha 
But skins like magnificent TF are even worse :S
Well then they should update all old legendary skins XD

Youre not wrong!

But they have said that they wont.
They would _"Rather spend the time creating amazing **new** skins."_

But funnily enough they still refuse to reduce the price on old legendary skins. :P
Pfft some great game designers they turned out to be. They can update old champs but not skins -.-
Yeah but since legendaries get interactions then this skin needs them
